Description: –     Follow up on retrieving all the needed documents for the job in compliance with the customs rules and regulations.–     Follow up with the ministries and other agents about any requirement as per the commodity of the shipment.–     Complete the declarations with supported documents as per the last updated Lebanese Customs Regulations.–     Submit once finished, the customs declarations to the Key Account Manager for control, and to proceed with the clearance.–     Ensure proper follow up with the concerned parties on the declarations file status and update client accordingly.–     Ensure proper shipment delivery process whenever required by the client :o  Set delivery date according to Client’s demand and approval.o  Collaborate with Local Deliveries Manager to execute clients’ instructions.o  Coordinate with the assigned Driver to ensure a proper follow up on the delivery status until execution.–     Collaborate with the Logistics department for all the local courier requests.–     Ensure proper archiving of the original documents related to the declarations.–     Send relevant documents to the Financial Department once job is executed.–     Update regularly the system with the shipment status.–     Perform any administrative tasks related to the job and keep the files updated.Skills
